title: Disable invalid characters for General Account Settings
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile Section
custom_steps: When in the General Account Settings section
custom_expected:
Then prevent users from entering invalid characters in the field

Fields that have requirements:
First Name - disable numbers and special characters, limit to 40 characters
Middle Name - disable numbers and special characters, limit to 40 characters
Last Name - disable numbers and special characters, limit to 40 characters
Mobile Phone - disable letters and special characters
Email address:
Regex for name and email:
var email = /^[^@]+@([^@.]+\.)+[^@.]+$/;
var name = /^[A-Za-z\u00C1\u00E1\u00C9\u00E9\u00CD\u00ED\u00D3\u00F3\u00DA\u00FA\u00DC\u00FC\u00D1\u00F1 ._\-']+$/;

title: User should be able to cancel their subscription/automatic renewal for MLB.TV

custom_steps: When the user wants to cancel their subscription/automatic renewal for MLB.TV
custom_expected: Then user is able to cancel their subscription/automatic renewal for MLB.TV

custom_expected: Then InGracePeriod/outGracePeriod is determined from API

title: 5 day grace period from when a user originally makes a purchase.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user makes a purchase
custom_expected: Then there is a 5 day grace period from when the user originally made the purchase.

title: Grace period is honored when inside 5 day grace period
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is IN the 5 day grace period
custom_expected: Then the grace period should be honored allowing the user to cancel for this season

title: User adheres to the 4 step Cancellation Flow
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When attempting to cancel a subscription or automatic renewal
custom_expected:
Then user adheres to the 4 step Cancellation Flow:
Step 1 = click in Subscription status section and see your subscription status
Step 2 = clicking "cancel subscription/cancel automatic renewal" button and initiating cancellation flow (in modal)
Step 3 = confirming cancellation request (in modal)
Step 4 = clicking "return to account" button and returning to profile, where copy indicating you have submitted a cancellation request will surface

title: Flow is the same for users all users. (In or out of grace period)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is either IN or OUT of the grace period
custom_expected: Then the cancellation flow is still the same.

title: If the user is out of the grace period then subscription is canceled for next season
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is OUT of the grace period
custom_expected: Then the users subscription is canceled for next season

title: Clicking "Cancel Automatic Renewal", brings up modal
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When clicking "Cancel Automatic Renewal"
custom_expected: Then the user is shown a pop up modal

custom_steps: When the user is going through step 2 of the Cancellation Flow
custom_expected: Then user should see "reasonForCancel" with dropdown menu listing reasons to cancel

title: Submit Cancel button should not be clickable until reason for cancellation has been selected from dropdown menu
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Subscriptions section of the Account Profile
custom_steps: When the user is going through step 2 of the cancellation flow
custom_expected: Then Submit Cancel button should not be clickable until reason for cancellation has been selected from dropdown menu

custom_steps: When the user has cancelled their automatic renewal
custom_expected: Then user should see this message "The automatic renewal of your subscription has been cancelled"

custom_steps: When the user completes the cancellation flow
custom_expected: Then user should receive email confirmation of cancellation

custom_steps: When the user has completed step 2 of the cancellation process
custom_expected: Then user should see "Return to account" button after cancellation

title: Credit Card information contains the correct fields
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_steps: When viewing Credit Card information
custom_expected:
Then Credit Card information contains the correct fields:
Fields to include (screenshots attached):
Name on Card
Credit Card Type (MasterCard, Visa, Discover, Amex)
Credit Card Number
Expiration Date (Month, Year)
MasterCard logo + "preferred by MLB"
First Name
Last Name
Address
Address 2
City
State/Province
Zip/Postal Code
Country
Mobile Number
Check box for Primary Credit Card ("Set as Primary")

title: Save Changes button should be disabled when user visits the account profile section.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_expected: Then Save Changes button should be disabled

title: Save Changes button should be disabled unless it detects a change.
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile section
custom_expected: Then Save Changes button should be disabled unless it detects a change.

title: User must keep one card on file if auto renewal is ON
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the Account Profile
custom_steps: When viewing Subscriptions and the user has auto renewal ON
custom_expected: Then the user must have atleast one card on file

title: Remove delete button if 1 card on file and user has auto-renewal ON
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the Account Profile
custom_steps: When viewing Subscriptions and the user has auto renewal ON
custom_expected: Then delete button should be removed

title: User is able to submit AMEX with 4 digit CVV
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When adding a payment method and using an AMEX card
custom_expected: Then the user must enter a 4 digit CVV and is able to submit and save the card

title: User is able to submit non-Amex with 3 digit CCV
custom_preconds: Given the user is on Account Profile
custom_steps: When adding a payment method and using a non-Amex card (e.g. Mastercard, Visa, Discover)
custom_expected: Then the user must enter a 3 digit CVV and is able to submit and save the card

title: User is notified when saving an update to the Account Profile
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When saving an update to their profile
custom_expected: Then user is notified when saving an update to the Account Profile

title: Upon successful saved changes, green bar appears on bottom of browser window
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When successfully saving a change to their profile
custom_expected: Then green bar appears on bottom of browser window

title: Green bar stays on screen for 5 seconds, then disappears
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When successfully saving an update to their Account Profile
custom_expected: Then Green bar stays on screen for 5 seconds, then disappears

title: Green bar is fixed to the bottom of the browser window
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When successfully saving a change
custom_expected: Then Green bar is fixed to the bottom of the browser window

title: Visual text displays: Copy: "(Name of field) saved successfully!"
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the Account Profile
custom_steps: When successfully saving an update to the Account Profile
custom_expected: Then Visual text displays: Copy: "(Name of field) saved successfully!"
